FuncDef: The display mbus version command displays the MonitorBus version.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a power module/fan module/board.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a board fails to register, you can run the display mbus version command to check whether the MonitorBus version of the unregistered board is the latest or not, helping to locate faults.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
